code: import axios from"axios";const apiClient=axios.create({baseURL:"http://localhost:9900/sms-mgmt"});apiClient.interceptors.request.use(config=>{const storedUser=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("user"));const token=storedUser===null||storedUser===void 0?void 0:storedUser.token;if(token){config.headers.Authorization=`Bearer ${token}`;}return config;});export default apiClient;
